'''''Tolkien and C.S. Lewis: The Gift of Friendship''''' is a book which explores the friendship of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] and [[C.S. Lewis]].

==From the publisher==

{{blockquote|This book explores their lives, unfolding the extraordinary story of their complex friendship that lasted, with its ups and downs, until Lewis's death in 1963. Despite their differences - of temperament, spiritual emphasis, and storytelling style - what united them was much stronger: A shared vision that continues to inspire their millions of readers throughout the world}}.
